chat.msg: Welcome!
hi
Hey there
Where should i go?
go on the stick to the tiger's island.
Awsome! as you said, i'm now near the leopard
go under the black rock, and leave the island on the stick toward the parrot's island.
Awsome! i have reached the parrot
make  a 270 degrees loop around the parrot counter clockwise.
I have already passed by the parrot
go above the parrot, and then between the parrot and the elephant.
But i have not reached the 3 rocks yet
now cross the 3 rocks (two grey rocks and one black rock) to the frog's island.
Ok, i did it, i'm next to the frog
go below the frog and the return to the crocodile's tail.
Awsome! as you said, i'm now near the crocodile
cross the sea on the crocodile's body.
I have already been at the crocodile
ok. From the crocodile's mouth, go up on the big black rock.
Ok, i did it, i'm next to the big rock
now continue below the elephant and go on the two grey rocks to the giraffe's island.
Ok, i did it, i'm next to the elephant
continue to the giraffe.
Ok, i did it, i'm next to the giraffe
now go next to the giraffe's feet, and continue down toward the stick to the snake's island.
Awsome! i have reached the snake
go to the treasure.
Awsome! i have reached the treasure

user_survery.answer: It's natural, but I generally don't like it.
